title.rendered: ClinLab Grows: Life Sciences Staffing Firm Moves to Bigger HQ in Watertown, MA

content.rendered:
ClinLab Staffing (www.clinlabstaffing.com), ranked among the fastest-growing private companies in Massachusetts by the Boston Business Journal, moved to its new headquarters at the Riverworks Innovation Center in the Charles River Mill District of Watertown Massachusetts, effectively doubling its workspace to make way for expansion.

“The new space will allow us to continue growing by offering better access to the biopharma clusters of New York, Raleigh-Durham, and Boston-Cambridge,” said Andrius Montvila, CEO of ClinLab. “Plus we get the added benefit of being able to support the growth of our own workforce by tapping into this commuter, bicycle, and public transportation-friendly location in Watertown, MA on the Charles River.”

In the new space, ClinLab hopes to host events for clients, sharing the latest in life science staff management, policy, technology, and research. “ClinLab is in a unique position to share market knowledge that can benefit hiring managers in this incredibly fast-moving marketplace,” said Jim McKeever, Director of Sales. “Companies can sign up for notifications about upcoming events by ClinLab at https://clinlabstaffing.com/events.”

About
ClinLab has been providing key staff to many of the most successful life sciences, biotechnology and pharmaceutical organizations in the United States for more than a 15 years. We are a full-service staffing firm with a solid reputation and a service team that can handle everything from highly specialized positions to big jobs with precision and integrity.
